description:
Collect awesome monsters to use during turn-based battles in this open-world RPG.
Combine any two monster forms using Cassette Beasts’ Fusion System to create
unique and powerful new ones!

v0.0.1.description:
First release of the Cassette Beasts AP mod.

### Download / Install instructions

Download the .apworld and .pck files.  The ap file will go in the custom_worlds folder in the Archipelago files.  The pck mod will go in your Cassette Beasts mod folder generally located in `C:\Users\(username)\AppData\Roaming\CassetteBeasts\mods` for windows and `~/.local/share/CassetteBeasts/mods/` for linux.
NOTE: This mod requires cat's mod utils mod as well and will not work without it.  It can be found on the steam workshop, Mod Utils by cat.

Future releases will use auto generated notes, but this one is so big that those notes wouldn't be useful.

A non-exhaustive list of things that are supported that I can remember:
- In game AP connection, which means it does not require an ap client to be open
- Randomized pickups include chests, song fragments, captain stamps, and items either given by NPCs or dropped
- Progressive items include song fragments, captain badges, and abilities
- Some changes to the early game have been made to keep early BK from happening
  - After the intro harbourtown scenes you are jumped ahead as if you had finished the intro.  This unlocks the elevator and keeps you from becoming almost instantly blocked behind the harbourtown gate key.
  - You will still need to go to the subway in order to unlock it, fast travel, and get the chest inside.
- Prior to starting a new game you will want to make sure that you are connected to the AP server, as you will not have access to the menu until after the harbourtown intro scenes.
  - The AP settings menu is added as another tab in the settings (probably the last tab)
- We put in some popups on save creation/load around the connection to the server, but they are not foolproof.
v0.0.1.title: v0.0.1

v0.0.2.description:
Fixes an issue where the swim ability was not being activated when sent from the server.

**NOTE:** while all 3 files are packaged here, only the .apworld file has changed.  Neither the mod or the tracker changed in this update.  Any server created with the old .apworld file will continue to have the issue.

## What's Changed
* Main -> develop by @sitskin in https://github.com/sitskin/apCassetteBeasts/pull/24
* Update issue templates by @sitskin in https://github.com/sitskin/apCassetteBeasts/pull/25
* AP: CB Id missmatch by @sitskin in https://github.com/sitskin/apCassetteBeasts/pull/26
* Update issue templates by @sitskin in https://github.com/sitskin/apCassetteBeasts/pull/28
* Release/0.0.2 -> main by @sitskin in https://github.com/sitskin/apCassetteBeasts/pull/27


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/sitskin/apCassetteBeasts/compare/v0.0.1...v0.0.2
v0.0.2.title: v0.0.2

v0.0.3.description:
## Mod updates
Updated the WS buffer to 20 MB, which should be enough to handle the majority of game's data packages.

## Tracker updates
Updated the tracker to combine two (6,-2) sections into one

## What's Changed
* Main -> develop by @sitskin in https://github.com/sitskin/apCassetteBeasts/pull/29
* Mod: Increase WS input buffer. by @sitskin in https://github.com/sitskin/apCassetteBeasts/pull/30
* Tracker: Fix location overlap by @sitskin in https://github.com/sitskin/apCassetteBeasts/pull/31
* Release/0.0.3 -> main by @sitskin in https://github.com/sitskin/apCassetteBeasts/pull/32


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/sitskin/apCassetteBeasts/compare/v0.0.2...v0.0.3
v0.0.3.title: v0.0.3

v0.0.4.description:
There are changes to all 3 files in this release.

## What's Changed
* main -> dev by @sitskin in https://github.com/sitskin/apCassetteBeasts/pull/33
* AP: Fix chest 0,-2 access logic. by @sitskin in https://github.com/sitskin/apCassetteBeasts/pull/34

* Mod: Fix battle increase bug by @sitskin in https://github.com/sitskin/apCassetteBeasts/pull/38
* Mod: Add check for location key. by @sitskin in https://github.com/sitskin/apCassetteBeasts/pull/39

* Various location fixes by @sitskin in https://github.com/sitskin/apCassetteBeasts/pull/40
* Add changelog file. by @sitskin in https://github.com/sitskin/apCassetteBeasts/pull/42
* World dev by @sitskin in https://github.com/sitskin/apCassetteBeasts/pull/44
* Add release documentation. by @sitskin in https://github.com/sitskin/apCassetteBeasts/pull/43
* Release procedure for 0.0.4. by @sitskin in https://github.com/sitskin/apCassetteBeasts/pull/45

v0.0.5.description:
### Download / Install instructions

Download the .apworld and .pck files.  The ap file will go in the custom_worlds folder in the Archipelago files.  The pck mod will go in your Cassette Beasts mod folder generally located in `C:\Users\(username)\AppData\Roaming\CassetteBeasts\mods` for windows and `~/.local/share/CassetteBeasts/mods/` for linux.
NOTE: This mod requires cat's mod utils mod as well and will not work without it.  It can be found on the steam workshop, Mod Utils by cat.

### Fixed
- Tutorial item not sending the location check for type chart
- Post AA cutscene requires player to be in the cafe
- Logic required in order to recruit sunny
- Spider Cave region and chest access logic
- Waterloop key id
- Heckahedron access now requires waterloop key
- Add event tracking for clearing all landkeeper offices
- Fix the tracker's landkeeper key id
- Add flag mapping functionality to fix kuneko and averevoir locations

### Added
- Shining Kuneko tracker location


## What's Changed
* Merge pull request #46 from sitskin/release/0.0.4 by @sitskin in https://github.com/sitskin/apCassetteBeasts/pull/47
* Mod: Fix cafe retro happening outside of the cafe. by @sitskin in https://github.com/sitskin/apCassetteBeasts/pull/49
* Mod: Fix tutorial item sending type chart location. by @sitskin in https://github.com/sitskin/apCassetteBeasts/pull/48
* Tracker: Fix landkeeper key name. by @sitskin in https://github.com/sitskin/apCassetteBeasts/pull/50
* Tracker: Add landkeeper offices tracking. by @sitskin in https://github.com/sitskin/apCassetteBeasts/pull/51
* AP,Tracker: Waterloop key and Heckahedron access by @sitskin in https://github.com/sitskin/apCassetteBeasts/pull/52
* Mod: Add flag converter. by @sitskin in https://github.com/sitskin/apCassetteBeasts/pull/53
* AP,Tracker: Fix access logic for Spider Cave Chest. by @sitskin in https://github.com/sitskin/apCassetteBeasts/pull/54
* AP: Add becoming captain to recruited sunny logic. by @sitskin in https://github.com/sitskin/apCassetteBeasts/pull/55
* Release/0.0.5 => main by @sitskin in https://github.com/sitskin/apCassetteBeasts/pull/56


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/sitskin/apCassetteBeasts/compare/v0.0.4...v0.0.5
v0.0.5.title: v0.0.5

v0.0.6.description:
### Download / Install instructions

Download the .apworld and .pck files.  The ap file will go in the custom_worlds folder in the Archipelago files.  The pck mod will go in your Cassette Beasts mod folder generally located in `C:\Users\(username)\AppData\Roaming\CassetteBeasts\mods` for windows and `~/.local/share/CassetteBeasts/mods/` for linux.
NOTE: This mod requires cat's mod utils mod as well and will not work without it.  It can be found on the steam workshop, Mod Utils by cat or it can be downloaded from [the github releases](https://github.com/Yukitty/CassetteBeasts-modutils/releases) and put in the same folder above.

### Fixed
- AP Tutorial Item overriding
- Tracker logic for Lodstein and marsh cave chest
- AP and Tracker valve handle logic

### Added
- Warp to Entrance button when in an area that you cannot fast travel
- Tracking of all sent items and re-sending on connect

## What's Changed
* Main => develop by @sitskin in https://github.com/sitskin/apCassetteBeasts/pull/57
* Update issue templates by @sitskin in https://github.com/sitskin/apCassetteBeasts/pull/58
* Mod: Fix ap tutorial item not overriding original. by @sitskin in https://github.com/sitskin/apCassetteBeasts/pull/59
* MOD: Add tracking of all sent locations. by @sitskin in https://github.com/sitskin/apCassetteBeasts/pull/62
* MOD: Add Warp to Entrance button in settings. by @sitskin in https://github.com/sitskin/apCassetteBeasts/pull/63
* AP: Add english setup file. by @sitskin in https://github.com/sitskin/apCassetteBeasts/pull/64
* MOD: Remove map pause base function call. by @sitskin in https://github.com/sitskin/apCassetteBeasts/pull/65
* AP,Tracker: Fix valve handle logic. by @sitskin in https://github.com/sitskin/apCassetteBeasts/pull/66
* Tracker: Fix Lodestein and Marsh Cave -7,-1 access logic. by @sitskin in https://github.com/sitskin/apCassetteBeasts/pull/67
* Release/0.0.6 by @sitskin in https://github.com/sitskin/apCassetteBeasts/pull/68


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/sitskin/apCassetteBeasts/compare/v0.0.5...v0.0.6
